trans-unit.source: Defines an endpoint that is authorized by a <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> instance.
The EndpointPermission class defines a network endpoint, including host name, network port number, and transport type used to make the connection.
> [!NOTE] > Avoid creating EndPoint permissions using host names because these names will have to be resolved to IP address, which could block the stack.
Determines whether the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref> is equal to the current <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>.
The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref> is equal to the current <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
A hash code for the current <xref:System.Object>.
Gets the DNS host name or IP address of the server that is associated with this endpoint.
A string that contains the DNS host name or IP address of the server.
Gets the network port number that is associated with this endpoint.
The network port number that is associated with this request, or <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission.AllPorts"></xref>.
Returns a string that represents the current <xref href="System.Net.EndpointPermission"></xref> instance.
The ToString method returns a string that represents the contents for the <xref:System.Net.EndpointPermission> instance.
The string is in the form <xref:System.Net.EndpointPermission.Hostname%2A> # <xref:System.Net.EndpointPermission.Port%2A> # <xref:System.Net.EndpointPermission.Transport%2A>.
A string that represents the current <xref href="System.Net.EndpointPermission"></xref> instance.
Gets the transport type that is associated with this endpoint.
